attributes.action: Anna Soubry. Should be made to stand a by election now she has quite the tories
attributes.additional_details: She was elected on a tory manifesto, she quit making her an independent and she now disagrees with the manifesto she was elected to serve therefore a by election is just
attributes.background: Anna Soubry left the tory party and should now stand in a by election as she was voted in on a tory manifesto! She has also thwarted the brexit process after agreeing to adhere to the referendum result! Whether leave or remain MPs should be held accountable for there lies
